page.shortlink: api client api a5 panellayout getpanel method

argument.name: panel
argument.description: The name of the panel to get. Multiple nested panels (such as a panel card in a panel layout) can be retrieved by using a ":" to separate names.

return.name: panel
return.description: The panel object. Actual child panel class accessible through the "src" property of the returned object. See *[link:A5.PanelNavigator Panel Object]* and *[link:A5.PanelLayout Panel Object]*.

page.description: Get a child panel of the layout.
